oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George Hamilton IV at Connecticut Valley Fair (20001)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hamilton, George, IV, 1937-2014; Price, Kenny; Wright, Ruby (Vocalist); Fairs; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing George Hamilton IV, Kenny Price, and Ruby Wells at the Connecticut Valley Fair on August 11, 12, and 13. Poster features metal photoplates of George Hamilton IV, Kenny Price, and Ruby Wells. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/51372/
